text: Hans-Peter Dürr (October 7, 1929 – May 18, 2014) was a German physicist. He worked on nuclear and quantum physics, elementary particles and gravitation, epistemology, and philosophy. He was born in Stuttgart and died in Munich. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2014 deaths Category:German physicists Category:Scientists from Stuttgart
title: Hans-Peter Dürr
